title: Pavel Logačev
text:
I help companies make better decisions through statistical modeling — especially when data is limited, messy, or poorly understood.
Get in touch if you’d like to work together.
How I work

I take time to understand your business context before modeling
I build interpretable models, not black boxes
I deliver working solutions — not just reports
I communicate clearly with technical and non-technical stakeholders

title: Pavel Logačev
text:
What I Do

Demand modeling and forecasting
Price elasticity estimation
Causal inference (A/B tests, observational studies)
Bayesian methods for sparse data
Custom models tailored to your domain

title: Pavel Logačev
text:
Background
PhD in Cognitive Science (University of Potsdam). Before freelancing, I worked in academic research and then transitioned to applied data science in industry.
I’ve worked with retailers, distributors, and restaurant chains on problems involving pricing, demand, and forecasting. Most of my work is done through agencies, but I also take on direct engagements.
Based in Berlin. I work with clients across Europe and North America.
Languages: English, German, Russian.

title: Pavel Logačev
text:
I’m a freelance data scientist specializing in statistical modeling for business decisions — particularly in settings where data is messy, experimentation is limited, and off-the-shelf solutions fall short.
My work spans demand modeling, price elasticity estimation, forecasting, and causal inference. I build custom models using Bayesian methods, designed around the structure of your specific problem.
I’ve worked across B2C and B2B contexts, collaborating closely with stakeholders to understand how business processes actually work — so models reflect what matters and make the most of available data.
Learn more →
